item.title: Startup seeks utility player (QA/CS/Social Media) (san mateo)
item.description:
Hot & well-funded 3 person startup based in downtown San Mateo (already generating revenue) is looking to hire employee number 4. Founders are from PayPal and Slide. We need a scrappy/versatile/smart self starter who is willing to work hard, learn on the job, cover many bases, and help our business grow. This is an excellent career opportunity for a recent college graduate who is looking to break in to the startup culture, or for a multi-faceted QA engineer/web developer who is looking to broaden her/his career path.

Responsibilities include:
- Quality assurance: testing our website in various browsers & new features on various browsers
- Community support: answering emails, building/maintaining a FAQ
- Social media evangelist: facebook/blogging/tweeting
- General website maintenance: updating HTML, CSS, some javascript

Requirements:
- College degree
- 1-3 years relevant experience
- Experinece in web-based QA engineering, preferably with automation
- Demonstrates strong problem-solving skills
- Excellent writing skills

Nice extras:
- Any programming knowledge/experience
- Prior experience in product/project management
- Passionate technologist
- Active blogger/twitter user

Benefits include:
- Competitive salary
- Equity in the company
- Generous health/dental insurance package
- Casual work environment

To be considered for this position, please send an email to htjobofferings@gmail.com
- The subject should be "CraigsList job offering"
- Please attach your resume, preferably in pdf, html, or text format. A URL to your online resume is fine.
- Briefly describe how you would go about testing a change machine (like the machines that give you quarters at the laundromat).
- Write instructions on how to change the color of the events in your Google Calendar. Assume this is for a FAQ page.
- Write two sample tweets (140 characters or less) promoting a fictional blog post entitled "Massage therapists: How to advertise your small business online"
